abstract.value: The book analyzes a system and facility of credit provision, existing in the Republic of Belarus. The theory of organization of the system and the mechanism of lending and credit facility is researched; new models and mechanisms of credit provision, based upon theoretical analysis, are developed. Essence of the loan as a factor, ensuring the development of productive capacities of enterprises, is substantiated. Functions of the credit, appearing the element of credit lending and the role of credit is credit system are evaluated. Credit principles as a basis of credit relations are analyzed, lending process management is suggested, procedure and conditions for lending of enterprises is substantiated. The most important methods of financing of businesses structures are enumerated; types and forms of credit, determining the structure of the credit facility are determined. A model of effective mechanism of lending is suggested, background of functioning of crediting mechanism is formed. The processes of organization and management of credit mechanism are analyzed; formation of the effective lending policy, supposing autonomous responsibility of credit system on external effects and ability to keep sustainability of the whole system, is offered.
